member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: Specifies date-time format options.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the format string.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat.#ctor(System.String,System.IFormatProvider)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the format string and format provider.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat.DateTimeStyles
member.summary: Gets or sets the formatting options that customize string parsing for some date and time parsing methods.
member.returns: The formatting options that customize string parsing for some date and time parsing methods.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat.FormatProvider
member.summary: Gets an object that controls formatting.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.DateTimeFormat.FormatString
member.summary: Gets the format strings to control the formatting produced when a date or time is represented as a string.
member.returns: The format strings to control the formatting produced when a date or time is represented as a string.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.EmitTypeInformation
member.summary: Specifies how often to emit type information.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Serialization.EmitTypeInformation.Always
member.summary: Always to emit type information.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Serialization.EmitTypeInformation.AsNeeded
member.summary: As needed emit type information.

member.name: F:System.Runtime.Serialization.EmitTypeInformation.Never
member.summary: Never to emit type information.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert
member.summary: Serializes objects to the JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) and deserializes JSON data to objects. This class cannot be inherited.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.#ctor(System.Type)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class to serialize or deserialize an object of the specified type.
member.param: The type of the instances that is serialized or deserialized.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.#ctor(System.Type,System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Type})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class to serialize or deserialize an object of the specified type, with a collection of known types that may be present in the object graph.
member.param: The type of the instances that are serialized or deserialized.
An of that contains the types that may be present in the object graph.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.#ctor(System.Type,System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class to serialize or deserialize an object of the specified type and serializer settings.
member.param: The type of the instances that is serialized or deserialized.
The serializer settings for the JSON serializer.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets the format of the date and time type items in object graph.
member.returns: The format of the date and time type items in object graph.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.EmitTypeInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets the data contract JSON serializer settings to emit type information.
member.returns: The data contract JSON serializer settings to emit type information.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.KnownTypes
member.summary: Gets a collection of types that may be present in the object graph serialized using this instance of the .
member.returns: A that contains the expected types passed in as known types to the constructor.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.ReadObject(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Reads a document stream in the JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) format and returns the deserialized object.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.SerializeObjectReadOnlyTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to serialize read only types.
member.returns: true to serialize read only types; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.UseSimpleDictionaryFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use a simple dictionary format.
member.returns: true to use a simple dictionary format; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvert.WriteObject(System.IO.Stream,System.Object)
member.summary: Serializes a specified object to JavaScript Object Notation (JSON) data and writes the resulting JSON to a stream.
member.param: The object that contains the data to write to the stream.
member.exception: The type being serialized does not conform to data contract rules. For example, the attribute has not been applied to the type.
There is a problem with the instance being written.
The maximum number of objects to serialize has been exceeded. Check the property.

member.name: T:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings
member.summary: Specifies settings.

member.name: M:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings.DateTimeFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a DateTimeFormat that defines the culturally appropriate format of displaying dates and times.
member.returns: The DateTimeFormat that defines the culturally appropriate format of displaying dates and times.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings.EmitTypeInformation
member.summary: Gets or sets the data contract JSON serializer settings to emit type information.
member.returns: The data contract JSON serializer settings to emit type information.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings.KnownTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a collection of types that may be present in the object graph serialized using this instance the DataContractJsonConvertSettings.
member.returns: A collection of types that may be present in the object graph serialized using this instance the DataContractJsonConvertSettings.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings.MaxItemsInObjectGraph
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of items in an object graph to serialize or deserialize.
member.returns: The maximum number of items in an object graph to serialize or deserialize.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings.RootName
member.summary: Gets or sets the root name of the selected object.
member.returns: The root name of the selected object.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings.SerializeReadOnlyTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to serialize read only types.
member.returns: True to serialize read only types; otherwise false.

member.name: P:System.Runtime.Serialization.Json.DataContractJsonConvertSettings.UseSimpleDictionaryFormat
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to use a simple dictionary format.
member.returns: True to use a simple dictionary format; otherwise, false.
